text: Maria Elisabetta Casellati, n√©e Alberti (born 12 August 1946), is an Italian lawyer and politician. She was the President of the Italian Senate from 2018 to 2022. She is the first woman to have ever held this position.Discorso di insediamento in Aula di Maria Elisabetta Alberti Casellati, Presidente del Senato della XVIII legislatura In 2022, she was nominated as a candidate for President of Italy by centre-right coalition.Presidente della Repubblica ?, repubblica.it, 28 gennaio 2022 Election president, the crash of lawyer Casellati who was already seen at the Quirinale.https://www.repubblica.it/politica/2022/01/28/news/elezione_presidente_casellati_avvocatessa_sicura_del_quirinale-335623201/ No Presidente della Repubblica, repubblica.it, 29 gennaio 2022] She became Minister for Institutional Reforms in the Giorgia Meloni cabinet in 2022. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Italian Senate Category:Italian lawyers Category:Politicians from Veneto
title: Elisabetta Casellati
